meanings.definition: A person who registers or enrolls in a program or event.
meanings.sent1: The registrants lined up eagerly to sign up for the workshop.
meanings.sent2: There were many registrants for the cooking class at the community center.
meanings.sent3: The registrants at the marathon were so excited, they started running before the race began!
meanings.sent4: The registrants flooded in like a wave, eager to join the art class.
meanings.sent5: The registrants were like bees buzzing around the hive, eager to be part of the event.

meanings.definition: The act of registering or enrolling in a program or event.
meanings.sent1: After the registrants completed the forms, they were officially part of the workshop.
meanings.sent2: Online registrants receive a confirmation email after signing up for the webinar.
meanings.sent3: The registrants for the dance competition were so enthusiastic, they started practicing in the waiting area.
meanings.sent4: The process of registrants joining the event was smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the chatter of registrants excitedly filling out their registration forms.
